satmap.centre¶

satmap.centre(meta)¶

Centre of the image taken by the instrument.

Parameters¶

meta: dict

Meta data of the measurements taken by the instrument.

Returns¶

centre: tuple

Coordinates of the centre of the image.

aigeanpy
